title: Padre Island National Seashore: Calendar
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Calendar            Calendar       Ranger-led Interpretive Programs          Keyword       By Date     Start Date      End Date          Search         Upcoming Events    Showing 5 results    Show ALL instances of recurring events   RSS Feed      Padre Island National Seashore Beach Walk      Time: 11:00 AM to 12:00 PM Location: Malaquite Beach Fees: Only entrance fee     Sunday, August 14, 2016 Every Sunday Weekly & Every Monday Weekly & Every Wednesday Weekly & Every Thursday Weekly & Every Saturday Weekly  from 06/01/2016 to 08/31/2016 Join a ranger for a leisurely 45-60 minute stroll on the beach. View Details      Padre Island National Seashore Deck Talk      Time: 1:00 PM to 2:00 PM Location: Malaquite Pavilion Fees: Only entrance fee     Sunday, August 14, 2016 Everyday  from 06/01/2016 to 08/31/2016 Join a ranger at Malaquite Pavilion to hear about some of the amazing things found at Padre Island National Seashore. View Details      Padre Island National Seashore Arts in the Park      Time: 1:00 PM to 2:00 PM Location: Malaquite Visitor Center Auditorium Fees: Only entrance fee     Tuesday, August 16, 2016 Every Tuesday Weekly  from 06/07/2016 to 08/30/2016 Find Your Park through art during this introduction to watercolor painting. View Details      Padre Island National Seashore Hidden Treasures      Time: 11:00 AM to 12:00 PM Location: Malaquite Visitor Center Pavilion and Beach Fees: Only entrance fee     Friday, August 19, 2016 Every Friday Weekly  from 06/03/2016 to 08/26/2016 Meet small animals that live at the surf's edge View Details      Padre Island National Seashore Free Sand Sculpting Lessons      Time: 11:00 AM to 2:00 PM Location: Malaquite Beach Fees: Free!     Saturday, August 27, 2016 Join a professional sand sculptor and learn how to build a beautiful sand castle. View Details
